paragraph.heading:
Mesopolobus nobilis (Walker 1834)
New record to China
( Fig. 16 )

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Platyterma nobile
Walker, 1834a: 304
, Lectotype ♀ , BMNH ( Examined, B.M. TYPE HYM 5.1824 ).

Biology.
M. nobilis
was recorded lives in the seeds of grasses ( Gramineae : Avena, Bromus). ( Rosen, 1962 ; Burks, 1979 )

Distribution. China ( Heilongjiang , Jilin , Inner Mongolia , Beijing , Hebei , Ningxia , Gansu , Qinghai , Xinjiang , Zhejiang , Hunan , Fujian , Sichuan , Yunnan );Palearctic, Nearctic and Oriental Regions ( Noyes, 2014 ).
